lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward
lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

privateUseAdjustment.title: Private use adjustment
privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred not solely for the property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

balancingCharge.title: Balancing charge
balancingCharge.description: If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

bpraBalancingCharge.title: bpraBalancing charge
bpraBalancingCharge.description: Income from the sale or grant of a long lease for a premium of renovated business premises within 7 years of first use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

periodOfGraceAdjustment.title: Period of grace adjustment
periodOfGraceAdjustment.description: Identifies a property which didn't qualify for FHL this year but qualified the year previous
